import React from "react" import { ListGroupItem } from "reactstrap" import productImg from "../../assets/images/product_01.1.jpg" import "../../styles/cartItem.css" const CartItem = ({ item }) => { const { id, title, price, image01, quantity, totalPrice } = item return (
{title}

{quantity} {totalPrice}

{quantity}
) } export default CartItem
